text:
Company: Green, Davis and Hernandez

Job Title: Senior Human Capital Partnership and Performance Management Analyst

About Us:
Green, Davis and Hernandez is a leading consulting firm dedicated to helping organizations thrive in an ever-changing business landscape. We pride ourselves on our commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion, and strive to create a workplace where everyone can bring their authentic selves to work.

Job Description:
We are seeking a Senior Human Capital Partnership and Performance Management Analyst to join our team. As a key member of our Human Capital department, you will be responsible for developing and implementing performance management strategies that drive business results. You will work closely with our leadership team to identify areas for improvement and develop solutions that enhance our organizational effectiveness.

Responsibilities:

 Develop and implement performance management strategies that align with business objectives
 Analyze data to identify trends and areas for improvement
 Collaborate with leadership to develop and implement solutions that drive business results
 Design and deliver training programs to enhance organizational effectiveness
 Foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement

Qualifications and Experience:
 Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field
 At least 5 years of experience in human capital management or a related field
 Proven track record of developing and implementing performance management strategies that drive business results
 Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
 Strong communication and interpersonal skills

What We Offer:
 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $85,000 to $110,000, based on your experience and skills.
 Comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance
 401(k) matching program
 Generous paid time off, including vacation, sick leave, and holidays
 Opportunities for professional development and growth
 A dynamic and inclusive work environment that values diversity, equity, and inclusion
